column5: Any reports from the east end of the lake? Anyone been down in Osbourne? I will be up there this week. Thanks in advance for any info or advice.

We fished Osborn Bay two days last week. We came from Temple Bay Lodge which is about a 40 minute boat ride and the fishing was slow, but better than Lost Bay or Blind Bay that we had fished earlier in the week. Fishing SLOW is the key as the fish were not active and we found that 1/8 oz jig heads worked best.
